group_1.textLeft: Did I mention a school club at all just now...?

group_1.textRight: Well, no. But don't you want to try having one?
Meeting up after school in a classroom, reading@whatever novels we like...
Reading whatever history books we like, watching@whatever films we like!

group_1.textLeft: What the heck kind of club is that?
We'd just be sitting around and doing whatever@we want.

group_1.textRight: But it *would* serve as a personal oasis, no?
With my expertise, I can make that oasis a@reality!
...That's what I mean!
Right! We can't just wear ourselves out with@constant Witch hunting.
And by using a school club as a pretense, it'll@be easier for me to produce films!

group_1.textLeft: ...It sounds like that's the part you're really@after?

group_1.textRight: Think about it from a practical standpoint,@though.
None of us can keep up with regular club@activities.
After all, if we see someone being attacked by a@Witch, saving them has to be our top priority!
Our youth! ...Our high school experience!@Could you give up on it to go deal with a Witch?!

group_1.textLeft: ...Now that you put it that way, it *is* starting@to feel like a bit of a waste.
But can we create a new club that easily?
And we'd need a fairly liberal definition of@what counts as club activities...

group_1.textRight: ...*Giggle*.@The odds are in my favor, I assure you.
To begin with...@I'll be borrowing your name, Komachi-senpai.
You've been featured in the local paper, and@specially acknowledged by all the teachers here.
If I tell them that you'd like to make a club in@the name of doing historical research...
I believe that the school administration will@welcome us with open arms!
I guess I'm fine with that...@But what about you, Kira?
You sure?

group_1.textLeft: We're all in danger of losing the opportunity to@spend time with our interests.
Me with my novels, Mihono with her movies...@And you with your history books, Komachi.
It might not sound like much, when I say it out@loud like that...
But we all understand how important those things@are to each other.
So I'm sure that Mihono will help to the best of@her ability, too.

group_1.textRight: Yes! Leave it all to me!
She really does seem determined.

group_1.textLeft: At the very least, it's good that she's back on@her feet, yes...?
